bill.title: Sex offenders; mandatory electronic monitoring.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 99-19-84, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Mandatory Lifetime Electronic Monitoring For Any Sex Offender For Any Period The Sex Offender Is Not Incarcerated; To Create New Section 47-5-1017, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require The Department Of Corrections To Electronically Monitor Sex Offenders; To Create New Section 47-5-1019, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Create The Crime Of Tampering With Electronic Monitoring Equipment; To Amend Section 47-7-33, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Electronic Monitoring Of Certain Parolees And Probationers; To Amend Section 47-7-34, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform; And For Related Purposes.
